basics.name: Jesús Alejandro Núñez González
basics.label: IT Support Technician and Junior Web Developer
basics.summary: Self-taught IT technician and junior web developer with hands-on experience in server configuration, basic web deployment, and automation through scripting. I’ve implemented internal solutions such as NAS-style servers and developed tools using Python and Google App Script to optimize daily workflows. I’m looking to join an IT environment where I can continue growing and applying my technical and web development skills.

work.name: Wiwynn
work.summary: I performed debugging and validation of high-performance AI servers for AWS, ensuring all hardware and software components functioned correctly. I used the Linux terminal and diagnostic tools to identify, analyze, and resolve hardware and software issues. I collaborated with engineering teams to troubleshoot server components such as CPUs, GPUs, memory, storage, and network interfaces, maintaining AWS quality standards. I verified system stability and functionality through test scripts and validation procedures before shipment. I ensured that only fully functional and certified servers were delivered to customers, maintaining high reliability and satisfaction.

work.name: Meineke
work.summary: I provide technical support for the SAS system. I solve problems with the technological equipment. I maintain the printers and make sure they are connected properly. I Performed preventive maintenance on DVRs and computer equipment across multiple locations. I Implemented an internal NAS-style server for file sharing among departments. I Managed user accounts and credentials. I Provided basic technical support to branch offices.

work.name: Meineke
work.summary: I managed the company's social media. I provided customer service to schedule appointments and made follow-up calls, as well as capturing data and preparing reports. I also assisted in implementing an appointment and calendar system within the Google ecosystem using Google Apps Script.

work.name: Soluciones Industriales
work.summary: I maintained communication with the client, generated invoices using ContPaq i, edited promotional videos, and managed social media.

work.name: XEJ Canal 50.1
work.summary: I operated cameras, microphones, and a switcher for live news production, as well as coordinating timing for on-air entrances and exits.

work.name: Orbita 106.7
work.summary: I created graphics for the station. I produced content for cultural programs. I scripted, recorded, and edited informative segments for public radio.

education.area: Engineering in Multiplatform Software Development and Management
Bachelor's Degree in Communication Sciences, specializing in Mass Media

projects.name: Guess my number
projects.description: Play against the machine and try to guess the number it's thinking of.
